name: Boatsafe training organisations
title: Boatsafe training organisations
description: The following dataset contains details on the Department of Transport and Main Roads approved BoatSafe training organisations.

sources.name: Department of Transport and Main Roads

fields.name: Title
fields.title: Boatsafe training organisation
fields.description: The company name of the Boatsafe training organisation

fields.name: Address 1
fields.title: Address 1
fields.description: Prefix to street address e.g. Shop or Unit number; Property name;

fields.name: Postcode
fields.title: Australia Post Postcode
fields.description: Australian postal code verification. Australia has 4-digit numeric postal codes with the following state based specific ranges. ACT: 0200-0299 and 2600-2639. NSW: 1000-1999, 2000-2599 and 2640-2914. NT: 0900-0999 and 0800-0899. QLD: 9000-9999 and 4000-4999. SA: 5000-5999. TAS: 7800-7999 and 7000-7499. VIC: 8000-8999 and 3000-3999. WA: 6800-6999 and 6000-6799

fields.name: Latitude
fields.description: Need to develop standard for Lat,Lon in CSVs. Should values be constrained to minimum bounding box around Queensland?

fields.name: Longitude
fields.description: Need to develop standard for Lat,Lon in CSVs. Should values be constrained to minimum bounding box around Queensland?

fields.name: Mobile 1
fields.title: Mobile Telephone Number - Primary
fields.description: Primary Mobile Telephone Number. 10 digits. Currently includes spaces - should these be stripped out? regex ^04[0-9]{8}

fields.name: Mobile 2
fields.title: Mobile Telephone Number - Secondary
fields.description: Secondary Mobile Telephone Number. 10 digits. Currently includes spaces - should these be stripped out?

fields.name: Website
fields.description: A markdown format of Hyperlink text and an associatied URL used on http://www.qld.gov.au/transport/boating/licences/boatsafe/. Hyperlink text is within square brackets. URL is within round brackets

fields.name: Area serviced
fields.title: Area serviced
fields.description: The general area in which training courses are provided

fields.name: URL
fields.title: Page name for BoatSafe training organisation on http://www.qld.gov.au/transport/boating/licences/boatsafe
fields.description: Concatenation of Title - Address2 Area Serviced. Used as part of URL to BoatSafe training organisation by appending to URL e.g. http://www.qld.gov.au/transport/boating/licences/boatsafe/?title=AAB%20All%20Australian%20Boating-11%20Sea%20Eagles%20Rd-Hervey%20Bay
